Articles.Content:
I've got 4 satellites orbiting and have successfully orbited the Kerbal earth with a manned escape pod. I am enjoying this game so much it's keeping me up! It's been years since I have ever had such a zeal for a piece of software ever, it's better than a lot of things I can think of. Just wanted to shout here, I will hopefully speak with any one of you later.

GP

I know that feeling. I was so enthusiastic when I played KSP the first time, too.

Well, your missions are a great beginning!

I think I speak for the whole forum if I say: Welcome and have fun around here and in KSP!
Welcome to the dark side of the paid version mate. Enjoy blowing stuff up in new and exiting ways.
I haven't played a game so much since Minecraft... And tf2, to a lesser extent.
